name: Hikage user
description: Hikage user, have Hikage in a server you own.

name: Pinger
description: Ping me when I ask you to. (Special badge)

name: Bug finder
description: Find a bug in hikage and notify the developer.

name: Number Guesser
description: Really rare badge you get when you guess the right number with !guess

name: Patreon
description: Be a very helpful Patron for Hikage, thank you so much!

name: Pinger 2
description: Ping me when I ask you to second serving. (Special badge)
